SELECT b_datarule.id FROM b_datarule,l_ruleview,b_dataview where b_datarule.id=l_ruleview.datarule and b_dataview.id=l_ruleview.dataview and b_dataview.F_PRIVATE=1 and b_datarule.F_ENABLE=1 and b_dataview.MASTER=(SELECT id FROM MASTERDATA where name=#{type})
and
b_datarule.id=#{task}
and b_datarule.id not in (select RULEID from G_RECORDEXTENDEDDETAILS where GC=#{factory})
select id,SUPERID,NAME,VALUE from BASEDATA where SUPERID=123575
select id,SUPERID,NAME,VALUE from BASEDATA where SUPERID=#{superId}

SELECT b_datarule.name key, wm_concat(to_char(B_PROPERTIES.name)) value FROM L_RULEVIEW join L_BILLENCODER on L_BILLENCODER.DATAVIEW = L_RULEVIEW.DATAVIEW join B_PROPERTIES on L_BILLENCODER.PROP = B_PROPERTIES.id join b_datarule on L_RULEVIEW.DATARULE = b_datarule.id WHERE L_RULEVIEW.DATARULE = #{id} group by b_datarule.name
select distinct F_DATARULE from L_CATEGORY2BILL join B_BILL BB on L_CATEGORY2BILL.F_BILL = BB.ID where F_CATEGORY=#{id}
